Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: we are only guessing what the problem may be... this may not do anything, but it shouldnt hurt it at least. The thing that frees the mem up after a round, only did so when state was set to 0xffffffff which is when it actualy finishes, if the function did a return because of an error, that round would not be released, so I added a finished flag, which is set before every return, and chaged it to free when finished is set.

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: also there was a chance that a round could cancel due to a new round starting, and that would leave the utxo on KMD locked forever until a restart of iguana.

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: i mean to dev rpc calls, you dont need migraate to work 100% of the time, but any other time... you kind of do, so getting ti to work reliably is the number 1 thing... I know it was working very well, without the -5 KMD height thing.... all thats doing is making sure a temporary reorg on KMD wont affect the process... as iguana is using the very tip of KMD height, and if the order notarizations changes due to a reorg, the MoMoM hash calcualted could be diffrent, when you call it during the import process.

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: meaning that import will fail, because the specific hash its looking for is missing.

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: but if some ndoes are using it and other are not, all kinds of undefined things happen

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: I know exactly how to make it not run into that bug, but its only covering it up, you just make it wait liek 10 KMD blocks between notarizations on all chains in the cluster.

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: I think chains with very low amounts of block producers will have issues with the latest code in that regard. seems Alright never made a working PoS attack, I think it miight be time to disable that test.

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: limits how many blocks in a row, a single ndoe can send you, so that you are forced to receive blocks from other nodes, but it slows down block propagation if the chain has like 2 or 3 miners.
